chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) (A m k x) (top m k x)

Premises:
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
eqc_eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) x (A m k x) -> eqc m z t -> eqc (B m k x) z t
eqc_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (bottom m k x) /\ eqc m x (top m k x)
eqc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (top m k x)
eqc_B_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc (B m k x) x (bottom m k x)
inv_hmap_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))
eqc_B_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) z t -> eqc m z t
A_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B m k x) k (A m k x) = nil
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
ndZ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> nd (B m k x) = nd m
expf_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t < -> expf m z t
A_not_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A m k x <> cA (B m k x) k x
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
top_top_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
not_succ_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k (top m k z)
top_top_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
bottom_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
eqc_eqc_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA m k y)
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m
ne_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> ne (B m k x) = ne m + (if eq_dim_dec k zero then 1 else 0)
nv_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> nv (B m k x) = nv m + (if eq_dim_dec k one then 1 else 0)
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
eqco_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqco m k x z t < -> eqc m z t
nc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in nc m0 = nc m + (if eqc_dec m0 x (A m k x) then 0 else 1)
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z

``` 
intros m k x H1 H2.
unfold eqc.
unfold B.
unfold A.
unfold top.
unfold succ in H2.
destruct H1.
destruct H2.
rewrite <- H1.
auto.
```
